price: Rwose tuzi ko uterwa agahinda cyane n’ibyo bavuga, ariko mu by’ukuri ntabwo ari wowe baba bahinyura, ahubwo inkozi z’ibibi ziba zihakana nkana ibimenyetso bya Allah.
arabic: قَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ إِنَّهُۥ لَيَحۡزُنُكَ ٱلَّذِي يَقُولُونَۖ فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُكَذِّبُونَكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ يَجۡحَدُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qad naʿlamu innahu layaḥzunuka alladhī yaqūlūna fa-innahum lā yukadhibūnaka walākinna al-ẓālimīna biāyāti al-lahi yajḥadūna
